nodes.val: color_pixels = Traverse the input_grid. If a non-black pixel is encountered, record its color and coordinates.(input_grid)
output_grid = Create a completely black image matrix with dimensions of 6x6.()

output_grid = Traverse the pixels recorded in step1 and perform the following: Assuming the current pixel coordinate is (i,j) and the color is c, color all pixels in the bottom-right 45-degree direction from the current pixel (coordinates (i+1,j+1), (i+2,j+2), (i+3,j+3),...) with the color c.(output_grid, color_pixels)
output_grid = Cover the 3x3 region on output_grid with input_grid starting at top left corner (0,0) and ending at bottom right corner (2,2).(output_grid, input_grid)
